item.description: Have you been wanting to check out the Brettl-Hupfers' but want to meet a few people before committing to a whole weekend with complete strangers?  Well, now is your chance to meet us in Boston!  Join the Bretts for some live band karaoke at the Landsdowne Pub from 8:00 - 11pm.  Karaoke starts at 9, so you'll have an hour to relax and get the nerve to get up and sing your heart out.  We promise not to judge!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the table of totally hardcore badass looking skiers and riders drinking beer. We'll also try to remember to bring a sign, so you can tell it's us.
item.name: Live Band Karaoke
